2003150.name: Day Of Pixel
2003150.description:
Your soul’s been nicked by El Diablo. You shall commence A supernatural open-world pixel western RPG experience.

 Think Spaghetti Western, Day Of The Dead, light rpg

 Free Demo Available Now!

Demo is now live! Play today!

 !8 Steam Curators Recommend Day of Pixel!

Countless youtuber feedback, many many pastor tacos eaten in this process sorry Chorizo!

Play How You Like

  • El Diablo: complete quests and missions like, fighting a giant moustache named El Bigote

  • Boss Battles: embark across Mexico, the underworld, Texas, and New Mexico oh more to come.

  • Hunt Bounties: Track down random outlaws from Town posters, and earn pesos as you make a name for yourself.

  •  Roaming Gangs: Dynamic gangs fight, taunt, and push against each other's control whether you help or not.

  •  Frontier Life: Farm  over twelve crops, cook more than 20 foods and empanadas! Or stop by saloons and shops for a quick bite before you head out on the trail.

  • Ownership & Trade: Buy cantinas, ranches, and shops. Regions have there own economies.

  • Underworld Portals: Día de los Muertos inspired underworld and tone, you might find slain enemies who remember you.

  • Companions: Alongside Salem (my real life cat) you may find companions spread out, they will help you survive and take out El Diablo!

  • Minigames: Relax and play poker, gaze at the stars, or sit on any bench or sit and let the world just pass.

Your Call, Partner

Help El Diablo, or kill him and save the world. While experiencing the vast worlds hand built by me and my cat!

Built by One Mad Cowboy

6+ years of solo development. Hand-drawn maps and pixel art. With help of my artist to clean my bad animal drawings @yankonnin.

Games For Gamers Always
2003150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
